title: SB 1186
content: The people of the State of California enact the following. The sum of $647,443.32 is appropriated to the Executive Officer of the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board for payment of accepted claims from specified funds. The schedule for payment includes allocations from various funds such as the General Fund and specific budget programs. The Controller is required to transfer surcharges and fees to a specific budget item as requested by the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board. The transferred amount should not exceed the total per claim filing fee and surcharge authorized by the Government Code. The board must report the recovered amounts to the Department of Finance within 90 days. The board must report the amounts recovered to the Department of Finance within 90 days of the enactment of this act. The General Fund appropriates sums for the payment of claims accepted by the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board. The amounts are $581,600 for Obie Steven Anthony III, $653,600 for John Smith, and $564,100 for Michael Smith. The General Fund appropriates funds for the payment of claims accepted by the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board. This includes $512,600 for Timothy Gantt, $654,500 for Marco Milla, and $762,440 for Larry Pohlschneider. The General Fund appropriates $936,880 to pay the claim of Luther Ed Jones, Jr. This act is an urgency statute to quickly address claims against the state.
